beer.beer_description: Our straw-coloured pilsner is crystal-clear and perfectly hopped, boasting a light taste and a lasting foam head with extra-fine bubbles. This all combines for a moment of pure pilsner enjoyment.

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 75 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 16!

What's better than enjoying a beer outside with food, music, games all in an enjoyable atmosphere? We couldn't think of anything. That's a beer at 10 different venues with the category of Beer Garden. Visit 5 more for Level 3!

items.checkin_comment: Had my first one of these in the 90's as an airman. How have I never checked this in??

user.bio: Trade beers. Share knowledge. Talk shit. Let's do it.

items.badge_description: It's the final week! Week 4 wraps with the last 3 styles of this year's Year in Beer Style Hunt. You've just tried one of three available styles during the week.

Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 30 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower. Try 5 more for Level 7!
Light and crisp, a Pilsner is all you need to make your day great. Though, perhaps another one would make it even better. That’s 10 different Pilsners. Try 5 more for Level 3!

beer.beer_description: Our straw-coloured pilsner is crystal-clear and perfectly hopped, boasting a light taste and a lasting foam head with extra-fine bubbles. This all combines for a moment of pure pilsner enjoyment.

items.checkin_comment: A unique flavor, starts to me as a bitter, finishes with the taste of honey. It’s a satisfying beer with a good middle of the road feel. Could have a good few of these. First tasted it visiting my grandpa and always caught my eye since.
